title: taufik123
author: taufik123
content: Shocking news came from the legendary exchange LocalBitcoins which has been operating for 10 years, they will close their services starting on February 9, 2023 yesterday with the suspension of new registrations, so they cannot register again and tomorrow February 16, 2023 will suspend trading and suspend the use of LocalBItcoin wallets. after February 17, 2023 LocalBitcoin customers can no longer use trading and wallet services. Customers who still have assets in LocalBitcoin are given 12 months to withdraw all their assets. Quote from: https://localbitcoins.com/service_closure/Timeline for discontinuing the Bitcoin trading service:2023-02-09 Suspension of new sign-ups 2023-02-16                       Suspension of trading on LocalBitcoins                       Suspension of using LocalBitcoins wallet (with exception of withdrawing one's funds)After 2023-02-17 LocalBitcoins customers will only be able to log-in to withdraw their Bitcoins. The trading and Wallet services will no longer be available at this point.Of course it is not without reason why LocalBitcoin has to close its services. This is because market conditions are no longer favorable, so it is forced to close. LocalBitcoins has actually experienced a decline in transactions since 2020 according to Forbes news and suspended user accounts without prior notice.https://www.forbes.com/sites/digital-assets/2023/02/09/localbitcoins-matching-exchange-cited-by-us-in-bizlato-case-to-close-after-10-years-of-operation/?sh=40112f3d301cand in 2017 according to data provided by Coindance, LocalBitcoins was processing $100 million worth of trades every week, but within the last four months of 2023, transactions dropped to $5.5 million-$7.5 million. So it can't be expected anymore, because there is no profit if it continues to operate.https://coin.dance/volume/localbitcoins/ALLWhat do you think about this Legendary Exchange, what are some memories you have with LocalBitcoins?
